Issue.creator: JIRAUSER20675
Issue.summary: ecdsakey Bytes() returns a Not supported error, but fabric-sdk-node returns Byte array
Issue.description: While creating a Commercial Paper application using fabric-sdk-go, I cannot retrieve the ecdsakey private key bytes needed to create the x509Identity. Calling the ```PrivateKey().Bytes()``` method throws a Not implemented error. However, this same code in the fabric-skd-node happily returns the Byte array of the ecdsakey. Perhaps this operation isn't allowed for a specific reason, and this isn't a bug at all, but to duplicate the workflow in go that the node application follows, I think that the private key is needed.
